channel.title: Voralscape Development Complete
channel.description:
[b][size=15pt]Voralscape Development[/size][/b]
Brief Notes: Well i posted this 3 months ago and it got deleted so ill repost again, this time the Voralscape Client is Ready!
[b]Voralscape Moderators:[/b] Mod Vo (Owner) Mod Tango Mod Trix Mod Astra Mod Owen
[b]Modertors:[/b] (None Yet)
[size=13pt]Aim: My aim is to make a server similar to RuneScape except, free... Well i have sucessfully done some of the aims which me and the Voralscape Team intended to do:[/size] [*] Fully Working Pest Control - Thanks to Mod Tango and Mod Astra [*] All Attacking Magic works, Runes needed just like real RuneScape - Thanks to Mod Vo [*] Fully Working Range, use ::starter with magic bow - Thanks to Mod Owen and Mod Trix [*] Added Special bar for most Weapons - Thanks to Mod Vo and Mod Tango (Llama aswell) [*] Lava Runes Replaces Blood Runes, as blood Runes lag the server [*] Ice Spells Freezes, - Enemies and Players, Entangle Freezes - Eniemes and Players [*] Rares will soon be just like RuneScape - Starting to drop PartyHats - Drops = By Mod Vo
[b]Note: These are just the BEST features of VoralScape[/b] --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- [b][size=20pt]Voralscape Information[/size][/b]
Forums: [url=http://voralscape.co.nr]voralscape.co.nr[/url]
To Log Onto Voralscape Simply Download the Client: [url=http://www.megaupload.com/?d=CL5Y1V4Y]http://www.megaupload.com/?d=CL5Y1V4Y[/url]
When you do Download the Client: If You Get a Connection Error, Please Do the Following: [*] Close the Client [*] Then Reload it again, this only happens if too much of programs are already up on your computer.
Here's Some Pictures: [img]http://aycu39.webshots.com/image/24278/2001527211202519987_rs.jpg[/img] [img]http://aycu24.webshots.com/image/23063/2001537372600063510_rs.jpg[/img] [img]http://aycu07.webshots.com/image/23006/2001538722656567565_rs.jpg[/img] [img]http://aycu13.webshots.com/image/20132/2001503328779740136_rs.jpg[/img] [img]http://aycu03.webshots.com/image/21962/2001597649736135267_rs.jpg[/img] [img]http://aycu34.webshots.com/image/24313/2001504812350136524_rs.jpg[/img] [img]http://aycu35.webshots.com/image/23434/2001511817305230019_rs.jpg[/img] [img]http://aycu07.webshots.com/image/23166/2001578099501194175_rs.jpg[/img] [img]http://aycu39.webshots.com/image/22478/2001551471975042464_rs.jpg[/img] [img]http://aycu40.webshots.com/image/23919/2001538694011027051_rs.jpg[/img] [img]http://aycu17.webshots.com/image/23736/2005941849027092827_rs.jpg[/img] [img]http://aycu18.webshots.com/image/22657/2005923883014612619_rs.jpg[/img] [img]http://aycu22.webshots.com/image/24181/2005927783467784542_rs.jpg[/img] [img]http://aycu13.webshots.com/image/22212/2005914079875531430_rs.jpg[/img] [img]http://aycu06.webshots.com/image/24525/2005920863382228244_rs.jpg[/img] [img]http://aycu17.webshots.com/image/19176/2005987315551438637_rs.jpg[/img] [img]http://aycu06.webshots.com/image/24525/2005918589483662380_rs.jpg[/img] [img]http://aycu40.webshots.com/image/24759/2005945010458083152_rs.jpg[/img]
Well this isn't the end of VoralScape, More updates will be Happening :)

item.title: Voralscape Development Complete
item.dc:creator: @Silver_Mace Silver Mace
item.description:
@Silver_Mace wrote:

                                       [b][size=15pt]Voralscape Development[/size][/b]

Brief Notes: Well i posted this 3 months ago and it got deleted so ill repost again, this time the Voralscape Client is Ready!

Voralscape Moderators:
Mod Vo (Owner)
Mod Tango
Mod Trix
Mod Astra
Mod Owen

Modertors:
(None Yet)

[size=13pt]Aim: My aim is to make a server similar to RuneScape except, free… Well i have sucessfully done some of the aims which me and the Voralscape Team intended to do:[/size]
[] Fully Working Pest Control - Thanks to Mod Tango and Mod Astra
[] All Attacking Magic works, Runes needed just like real RuneScape - Thanks to Mod Vo
[] Fully Working Range, use ::starter with magic bow - Thanks to Mod Owen and Mod Trix
[] Added Special bar for most Weapons - Thanks to Mod Vo and Mod Tango (Llama aswell)
[] Lava Runes Replaces Blood Runes, as blood Runes lag the server
[] Ice Spells Freezes, - Enemies and Players, Entangle Freezes - Eniemes and Players
[*] Rares will soon be just like RuneScape - Starting to drop PartyHats - Drops = By Mod Vo

Note: These are just the BEST features of VoralScape

                                     [b][size=20pt]Voralscape Information[/size][/b]

Forums: voralscape.co.nr

To Log Onto Voralscape Simply Download the Client:
http://www.megaupload.com/?d=CL5Y1V4Y

When you do Download the Client:
If You Get a Connection Error, Please Do the Following:
[] Close the Client
[] Then Reload it again, this only happens if too much of programs are already up on your computer.

Here’s Some Pictures:

















Well this isn’t the end of VoralScape, More updates will be Happening

Read full topic
